products.title: Faux Suede Mini Skirt
products.description: A faux suede mini skirt featuring exposed button-front closures and panel seam construction.

products.title: Ruched Rose Print Mini Skirt
products.description: A satin mini skirt featuring an allover floral print, ruched side with self-tie closure, concealed back zipper, and a flounce hem.
